message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  While I appreciate your offer, I believe a more equitable split reflects the diminishing value of the money for you in the next rounds.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This ensures fairness and takes into account the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
